ALL YOUR STUFF CUS A LVL 18 CLERIC IF BY HIMSELF WOULD NOT HAVE A FULLSET OF

LVLSL.

>From: kurt walther <itzkurt@...>

>Invigor can be helpgul if you ever fight underwater or swim for a long
>time. There ARE places where you fight in water.. heh. Fear is a very
>useful spell as well. I don't see how yall are so poor. I'm lvl 18 and
